description: If you've run out of sour cream and don't want to run to the store for moreâ€”you can make it at home with just two ingredients: heavy cream and vinegar!
keywords: cream, easy sour cream recipe, fermenting cream, sour cream
name: How To Make Sour Cream

recipeInstructions.text: Add the cream to a mason jar or other airtight container.
Add the vinegar to the cream. (Or whatever acid you decide to work with.)
Close the container and shake it for a minute or two, until the cream thickens.
Use the cream right away or leave the jar on your counter overnight to ferment and thicken.*
